raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences/rows that meet the criteria:


Binding AffinitiesClone VWF R9.14 Kd=12 nM
These aptamers bind to VWF with high affinity (K<sub>d</sub><20 nM) and inhibit platelet aggregation in Platelet Function Analyzer (PFA-100) and ristocetin induced platelet aggregation (RIPA) assays.
The Kd of round 9 reached the single digit nanomolar range, thus the individual clones making up the R9RNA pool were cloned and characterized.
A decreasing K<sub>d </sub>value pointed to increasing affinity of RNA molecules for VWF.

It was determined that aptamer 9.14 could be truncated from 80 nucleotides to 60 nucleotides without significantly reducing its ability to bind VWF (dissociation constant (Kd) of 44 nM compared to 12 nM for the full length aptamer)
